title: How to Prepare Tender & Delicious Wild Game w/ Tammy Trayer
itunes:title: How to Prepare Tender & Delicious Wild Game w/ Tammy Trayer
description: If you're a hunter or have the desire to cook wild game, then you won’t want to miss this episode. Learning these tips and tricks to cooking with wild game is a process, but Tammy Trayer can help us avoid common mistakes when preparing wild game. People often think they don't like the taste or texture of wild game, but it likely has more to do with the cooking methods than the meat. For all of the show notes and links, and how to find Tammy, visit https://melissaknorris.com/353.
